Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.RegularExpression: Perfect Alexander readies The Final Word.

Trigger.Name: Final Word Buff
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) gains the effect of Final Word: (?<debuff>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+) from .* for 10.00 Seconds

Dark go to Bravo line with Alpha
Dark go to Bravo line with Delta
Light Master go to Alpha wall
Dark Master go to Bravo edge

Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0044:Alexander Prime:I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.

Two Opposite CC, third puddle look middle
Five CC side cardinal, first puddle look outside
Six BJ side cardinal, first puddle look middle
Seven CC side cardinal, second puddle look outside
Eight BJ side cardinal, second puddle look middle
One, Cruise Chaser, third void, look outside
Two, Opposite Cruise Chaser, third void, look middle
Four, Opposite Brute Justice, look middle
Five, Cruise Chaser side void, 1st void, look outside
Six, Brute Justice side void, first void. look middle
Seven, Cruise Chaser side cardinal. Dodge chakrams. Second void, look outside
Eight, Brute Justice side Cardinal, dodge chakrams, second void, look middle

Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.Description: Checks if Inception is cast, sets $inceptiontime to 1, sets it back to 0 after 30000ms (tentative time)
